uvi.description:
usb: dwc3: ep0: fix NULL pointer exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.237 by commit 990dc90750772622d44ca2ea6652c521e6f67e16. For more details please see the references link.
